params.maxValue: Maximum boundary for the new setting.
params.minValue: Minimum boundary for the new setting.

params.max: Maximum value allowed for the setting.
params.min: Minimum value allowed for the setting.
params.name: Keccak'ed name for the setting.
The keccak'ed name for a setting.
Keccak'ed name for the setting.
params.newValue: the new value to set in the platform setting. Requirements:  - New value is equal to the current value.  - New value is grater than the max value.  - New value is less than the min value

params.max: New maximum boundary for the setting.
params.min: New minimum boundary for the setting.
params.name: Keccak'ed name for the setting.

PlatformSettingBoundariesUpdated(bytes32.notice: This event is emitted when a current platform setting is removed.

PlatformSettingCreated(bytes32,address,u.notice: This event is emitted when a new platform setting is created.

PlatformSettingUpdated(bytes32,address,u.notice: This event is emitted when a platform setting is updated.

createPlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256,ui.notice: It creates a new platform setting given a name, min and max values.

getPlatformSetting(bytes32).notice: Gets the values for a platform setting name.

updatePlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256).notice: It updates a current platform setting.

updatePlatformSettingBoundaries(bytes32,.notice: Updates the boundary (min & max) values for a platform setting.
